mapper.select: select e.event_content, e.event_title, s.name as store_name, sf.file_path, sf.system_name from tb_event e inner join tb_store s on e.seller_no = s.seller_no inner join tb_store_file sf on e.seller_no = sf.seller_no and sf.event_no is not null where e.seller_no = #{sellerNo}

select e.event_title, e.event_content, s.name, sf.file_path, sf.system_name from tb_event e inner join tb_store s on e.seller_no = s.seller_no inner join tb_store_file sf on e.seller_no = sf.seller_no and sf.event_no is not null order by e.event_no desc limit 10

select s.name, s.adress, s.latitude, s.longitude, s.seller_no, s.content, sf.file_path, sf.system_name from tb_store s inner join tb_store_file sf on s.seller_no = sf.seller_no and sf.store_no is not null where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

select s.name as store_name, m.name as menu_name, om.quantity, o.order_date, o.order_state, o.user_name, sf.file_path, sf.system_name from tb_order o inner join tb_order_menu om on o.order_no = om.order_no inner join tb_store s on o.seller_no = s.seller_no inner join tb_menu m on om.menu_no = m.menu_no inner join tb_store_file sf on m.menu_no = sf.menu_no and m.seller_no = sf.seller_no where o.user_name=#{userName} and o.seller_no = m.seller_no order by o.order_date desc
